verses.verse: Now the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3485>Issachar<s%> [were] <S%H702>four:<s%> <S%H8439>Tola,<s%> <S%H6312>Puah,<s%> <S%H3437>Jashub,<s%> and <S%H9616>Shimron.<s%>

And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H8439>Tola<s%> [were] <S%H5813>Uzzi,<s%> <S%H7509>Rephaiah,<s%> <S%H3400>Jeriel,<s%> <S%H3181>Jahmai,<s%> <S%H3005>Ibsam,<s%> and <S%H8050>Samuel,<s%> <S%H7218>heads<s%> of their fathers' <S%H1004>households.<s%> [The sons] of <S%H8439>Tola<s%> [were] <S%H1368>mighty<s%> <S%H1368>men<s%> of <S%H2428>valor<s%> in their <S%H8435>generations;<s%> their <S%H4557>number<s%> in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%> was 22600.

And the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5813>Uzzi<s%> [was] <S%H3156>Izrahiah.<s%> And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3156>Izrahiah<s%> [were] <S%H4317>Michael,<s%> <S%H5662>Obadiah,<s%> <S%H3100>Joel,<s%> <S%H3449>Isshiah;<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> of them [were] <S%H7218>chief<s%> <S%H7218>men.<s%>

And with them by their <S%H8435>generations<s%> according to their fathers' <S%H1004>households<s%> were 36000 <S%H1416>troops<s%> of the <S%H6635>army<s%> for <S%H4421>war,<s%> for they <S%H7235>had<s%> <S%H7235>many<s%> <S%H802>wives<s%> and <S%H1121>sons.<s%>

And their <S%H251>relatives<s%> among <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4940>families<s%> of <S%H3485>Issachar<s%> [were] <S%H1368>mighty<s%> <S%H1368>men<s%> of <S%H2428>valor,<s%> <S%H3187>enrolled<s%> by <S%H3187>genealogy,<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> 87000.
[The sons of] <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%> [were] <S%H7969>three:<s%> <S%H1106>Bela<s%> and <S%H1071>Becher<s%> and <S%H3043>Jediael.<s%>

And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1106>Bela<s%> were <S%H2568>five:<s%> <S%H675>Ezbon,<s%> <S%H5813>Uzzi,<s%> <S%H5816>Uzziel,<s%> <S%H3406>Jerimoth,<s%> and <S%H5901>Iri.<s%> They [were] <S%H7218>heads<s%> of fathers' <S%H1004>households,<s%> <S%H1368>mighty<s%> <S%H1368>men<s%> of <S%H2428>valor,<s%> and were 22034 <S%H3187>enrolled<s%> by <S%H3187>genealogy.<s%>

And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1071>Becher<s%> [were] <S%H2160>Zemirah,<s%> <S%H3135>Joash,<s%> <S%H461>Eliezer,<s%> <S%H454>Elioenai,<s%> <S%H6018>Omri,<s%> <S%H3406>Jeremoth,<s%> <S%H29>Abijah,<s%> <S%H6068>Anathoth,<s%> and <S%H5964>Alemeth.<s%> <S%H3605>All<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> [were] the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1071>Becher.<s%>

And they were <S%H3187>enrolled<s%> by <S%H3187>genealogy,<s%> according to their <S%H8435>generations,<s%> <S%H7218>heads<s%> of their fathers' <S%H1004>households,<s%> 20200 <S%H1368>mighty<s%> <S%H1368>men<s%> of <S%H2428>valor.<s%>

And the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3043>Jediael<s%> [was] <S%H1092>Bilhan.<s%> And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1092>Bilhan<s%> [were] <S%H3266>Jeush,<s%> <S%H1144>Benjamin,<s%> <S%H164>Ehud,<s%> <S%H3668>Chenaanah,<s%> <S%H2133>Zethan,<s%> <S%H8659>Tarshish,<s%> and <S%H300>Ahishahar.<s%>

<S%H3605>All<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> [were] <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3043>Jediael,<s%> according to the <S%H7218>heads<s%> of their fathers' households, 17200 <S%H1>mighty<s%> <S%H1368>men<s%> of <S%H1368>valor,<s%> who were ready to <S%H2428>go<s%> out with the <S%H3318>army<s%> to <S%H6635>war.<s%>
And <S%H8206>Shuppim<s%> and <S%H2650>Huppim<s%> [were] the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5893>Ir;<s%> <S%H9127>Hushim<s%> [was] the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H313>Aher.<s%>
The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5321>Naphtali<s%> [were] <S%H3185>Jahziel,<s%> <S%H1476>Guni,<s%> <S%H3337>Jezer,<s%> and <S%H7967>Shallum,<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1090>Bilhah.<s%>

The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> [were] <S%H844>Asriel,<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> his <S%H761>Aramean<s%> <S%H6370>concubine<s%> <S%H3205>bore;<s%> she <S%H3205>bore<s%> <S%H4353>Machir<s%> the father of <S%H1>Gilead.<s%>

And <S%H4353>Machir<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> a <S%H802>wife<s%> for <S%H2650>Huppim<s%> and <S%H8206>Shuppim,<s%> whose sister's <S%H8034>name<s%> was <S%H4601>Maacah.<s%> And the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H8145>second<s%> was <S%H6765>Zelophehad,<s%> and <S%H6765>Zelophehad<s%> <S%H1961>had<s%> <S%H1323>daughters.<s%>

And <S%H4601>Maacah<s%> the <S%H802>wife<s%> of <S%H4353>Machir<s%> <S%H3205>bore<s%> a <S%H1121>son,<s%> and she <S%H7121>named<s%> <S%H8034><s%> him <S%H6570>Peresh;<s%> and the <S%H8034>name<s%> of his <S%H251>brother<s%> [was] <S%H8329>Sheresh,<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons<s%> [were] <S%H198>Ulam<s%> and <S%H7552>Rakem.<s%>

And the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H198>Ulam<s%> [was] <S%H917>Bedan.<s%> <S%H428>These<s%> [were] the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4353>Machir,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh.<s%>
And his <S%H269>sister<s%> <S%H4447>Hammolecheth<s%> <S%H3205>bore<s%> <S%H379>Ishhod<s%> and <S%H44>Abiezer<s%> and <S%H4244>Mahlah.<s%>
And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H8061>Shemida<s%> were <S%H291>Ahian<s%> and <S%H7928>Shechem<s%> and <S%H3949>Likhi<s%> and <S%H593>Aniam.<s%>

And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> [were] <S%H7803>Shuthelah<s%> and <S%H1260>Bered<s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H8480>Tahath<s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H497>Eleadah<s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H8480>Tahath<s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%>

<S%H2066>Zabad<s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H7803>Shuthelah<s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%> and <S%H5827>Ezer<s%> and <S%H496>Elead<s%> whom the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H1661>Gath<s%> who were <S%H3205>born<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H2026>killed,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> they <S%H3381>came<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> to <S%H3947>take<s%> their <S%H4735>livestock.<s%>
And their father <S%H1>Ephraim<s%> <S%H669>mourned<s%> <S%H56>many<s%> <S%H7227>days,<s%> and his <S%H3117>relatives<s%> <S%H251>came<s%> to <S%H935>comfort<s%> him.

Then he <S%H935>went<s%> in to his <S%H802>wife,<s%> and she <S%H2029>conceived<s%> and <S%H3205>bore<s%> a <S%H1121>son,<s%> and he <S%H7121>named<s%> <S%H8034><s%> him <S%H1283>Beriah,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> <S%H9567>misfortune<s%> had <S%H1961>come<s%> upon his <S%H1004>house.<s%>
And his <S%H1323>daughter<s%> was <S%H7609>Sheerah,<s%> who <S%H1129>built<s%> <S%H8481>lower<s%> and <S%H5945>upper<s%> Beth-horon, also Uzzen-sheerah.
And <S%H7506>Rephah<s%> was his <S%H1121>son<s%> [along] with <S%H7566>Resheph,<s%> <S%H8520>Telah<s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H8465>Tahan<s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%>
<S%H3936>Ladan<s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H5989>Ammihud<s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H476>Elishama<s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%>
<S%H5126>Non<s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%> and <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> his <S%H1121>son.<s%>

And their <S%H272>possessions<s%> and <S%H4186>settlements<s%> [were] <S%H1008>Bethel<s%> with its <S%H1323>towns,<s%> and to the <S%H4217>east<s%> <S%H5295>Naaran,<s%> and to the <S%H4628>west<s%> <S%H1507>Gezer<s%> with its <S%H1323>towns,<s%> and <S%H7927>Shechem<s%> with its <S%H1323>towns<s%> as <S%H5704>far<s%> as <S%H5857>Ayyah<s%> with its <S%H1323>towns,<s%>

and <S%H5921>along<s%> the <S%H3027>borders<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh,<s%> Beth-shean with its <S%H1323>towns,<s%> <S%H8590>Taanach<s%> with its <S%H1323>towns,<s%> <S%H4023>Megiddo<s%> with its <S%H1323>towns,<s%> <S%H1756>Dor<s%> with its <S%H1323>towns.<s%> In <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H3427>lived<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>
The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H836>Asher<s%> [were] <S%H3232>Imnah,<s%> <S%H3438>Ishvah,<s%> <S%H3440>Ishvi<s%> and <S%H1283>Beriah,<s%> and <S%H8294>Serah<s%> their <S%H269>sister.<s%>
And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1283>Beriah<s%> [were] <S%H2268>Heber<s%> and <S%H4439>Malchiel,<s%> <S%H1931>who<s%> was the father of <S%H1>Birzaith.<s%>
And <S%H2268>Heber<s%> <S%H3205>became<s%> the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H3310>Japhlet,<s%> <S%H7763>Shomer<s%> and <S%H2369>Hotham,<s%> and <S%H7774>Shua<s%> their <S%H269>sister.<s%>
And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3310>Japhlet<s%> [were] <S%H6457>Pasach,<s%> <S%H1118>Bimhal,<s%> and <S%H6220>Ashvath.<s%> <S%H428>These<s%> were the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3310>Japhlet.<s%>
And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H8106>Shemer<s%> [were] <S%H277>Ahi<s%> and <S%H7303>Rohgah,<s%> <S%H3160>Jehubbah<s%> and <S%H758>Aram.<s%>
And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of his <S%H251>brother<s%> <S%H1987>Helem<s%> [were] <S%H6690>Zophah,<s%> <S%H3234>Imna,<s%> <S%H8028>Shelesh,<s%> and <S%H6000>Amal.<s%>
The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6690>Zophah<s%> [were] <S%H5477>Suah,<s%> <S%H2774>Harnepher,<s%> <S%H9594>Shual,<s%> <S%H1275>Beri,<s%> and <S%H3236>Imrah,<s%>
<S%H1221>Bezer,<s%> <S%H1936>Hod,<s%> <S%H8037>Shamma,<s%> <S%H8030>Shilshah,<s%> <S%H3506>Ithran,<s%> and <S%H878>Beera.<s%>
And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3500>Jether<s%> [were] <S%H3312>Jephunneh,<s%> <S%H6462>Pispa,<s%> and <S%H690>Ara.<s%>
And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5925>Ulla<s%> [were] <S%H733>Arah,<s%> <S%H2592>Hanniel,<s%> and <S%H7525>Rizia.<s%>

<S%H3605>All<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> [were] the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H836>Asher,<s%> <S%H7218>heads<s%> of the fathers' <S%H1004>houses,<s%> <S%H1305>choice<s%> and <S%H1368>mighty<s%> <S%H1368>men<s%> of <S%H2428>valor,<s%> <S%H7218>heads<s%> of the <S%H5387>princes.<s%> And the <S%H4557>number<s%> of them <S%H3187>enrolled<s%> by <S%H3187>genealogy<s%> for <S%H6635>service<s%> in <S%H4421>war<s%> was 26000 <S%H376>men.<s%>
